skins.shipDescription: Essex-class aircraft carrier ¨C Bunker Hill, Hull Number CV-17.
skins.selfIntroduction: Essex-class, Bunker Hill. My name comes from a battlefield in the Revolutionary War. I've seen my fair share of battles... and know that war brings nothing but sorrow and pain. Let's not talk about it any more.
skins.acquisition: Bunker Hill, one of the Essex-class carriers, is joining the fleet under your command. Don't worry, you'll see the extent of my abilities soon enough.
skins.login: We're in a state of emergency. Be prepared to run the Holiday Express, even if it's a holiday.
skins.details: Commander, why are you staring at me...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Right now, another place out there is being engulfed by the flames of war...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Eldridge's ability? I'm not exactly sure, but... I feel like I've seen it somewhere...
skins.secretaryIdle3: All resistance is meaningless before the Essex-class's attack formation.
skins.secretaryTouch: ...Don't think I'm upset just because I have little to say. Just let me know if you need anything.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: By the looks of things, you won't learn your lesson without some harder-hitting "experience."
